content.title: The Inland Waterways Authority of India Internship Scheme
content.department: Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways
content.details: Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI); a statutory body under the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways has introduced a scheme named 'The Inland Waterways Authority of India Internship Scheme'. This Internship Programme will provide an excellent opportunity to interns to familiarize them with the overall process of development of Inland Waterways Authority of India at the macro level.
benefits: Stipend @ ₹ 10,000/- for Undergraduates and ₹ 20,000/- for Post Graduate/ Research Scholars per month
Experience Certificate upon successful completion of the Internship
eligibility: A candidate must be pursuing or have completed a Graduate/PG degree from a recognized university
Graduates must have a score of at least 75% in the 12th standard
PG students must have obtained 60% marks in graduation
Research scholars must have scored a minimum of 60% marks in a PG degree
exclusions: Internship is neither a job nor any assurance for job in IWAI
No accommodation will be provided to interns
The internship may be terminated by IWAI by giving one month notice in case the performance of the candidate is not up to the mark
Interns not completing the requisite period as stipulated in their offer will not be issued with any certificate
documents_required: Letter from the Head of Department/ Principal, indicating their status in the institution
'No Objection' from the Head of Department/ Principal
Declaration of Secrecy (to be furnished before reporting for the internship)
A Report/Paper on the allotted subject at the end of the internship
Mandatory Feedback to the concerned HoD

faqs.question: To Whom Should The Offline Application Be Addressed?
faqs.answer: The offline application be addressed to the Secretary, Inland Waterways Authority of India, A-13, Sector-1, Noida-201301 or may apply online on the website of IWAI.

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Format Of The Application Form?
faqs.answer: The format of the Application Form can be found in Annexure-A of the Scheme Guidelines.

faqs.question: Does The Applicant Need To Attach His/Her CV Along With The Application Form?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should mandatorily attach his/her CV along with the application form.

faqs.question: What Documents Are Required To Be Submitted At The Time Of Completion Of The Internship?
faqs.answer: A Report/Paper on the allotted subject at the end of the internship and Mandatory Feedback to the concerned HoD.

faqs.question: By When Should The Intern Submit The Declaration Of Secrecy?
faqs.answer: The Declaration of Secrecy should be furnished by the applicant before reporting for the internship.

faqs.question: How Much Shall The Remuneration Be To The Undergraduate Interns?
faqs.answer: The remuneration to the Undergraduate Interns will be ₹ 10,000/- per month.

faqs.question: How Much Shall The Remuneration Be To The Post Graduate/ Research Scholar Interns?
faqs.answer: The remuneration to the Post Graduate/ Research Scholar Interns will be ₹ 20,000/- per month.

faqs.question: When Will The Amount Of Stipend Be Disbursed To The Interns?
faqs.answer: The amount of stipend disbursed to the Interns will be payable on satisfactory completion of their internship.

faqs.question: When Will The Remuneration For The Last Month Of The Internship Be Provided To The Interns?
faqs.answer: Last month's remuneration shall be provided on submission of their Report/paper.

faqs.question: What Logistic Support Will Be Provided By IWAI To The Interns?
faqs.answer: IWAI will provide them with a working space and reimburse for the travelling cost as per the entitlement of the Technical Assistant at IWAI.

faqs.question: Will IWAI Provide A Laptop To The Interns?
faqs.answer: No, the interns will be required to have their own laptops.
